messages: 3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (19:13): 0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf: sure and 8082 port too. but i provide the OPTIONS header and all
3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (19:14): 0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf: and either it would be allowed, so be done and no notification.... or it isnt allowed and not be done with a notification
3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (19:14): 0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf: but being done with a notification is cant be done... i dunno
0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf (19:34): if it works then it is X-site security issue
3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (19:37): 0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf: thanks. this is progress. this make the notification disapears
3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (19:41): 0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf: thanks!!! your trick helped me finding the issue
3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (19:41): 0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf: Access-Control-Allow- header must be sent in the OPTIONS *and* in the GET
3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (19:49): 0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf: if you got a trick to fix a canvas 'clean origin' issue, i am a taker too :)
3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (19:49): 0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf: i do .toDataUrl() on a canvas 3d, it works on chrome. but firefox complains about same origin issue
3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (19:50): 0acb83f1a9cfc48f061ff5555e61c6bf: i would like to know how to detect what change the "clean origin" bit
3e65db05e37f34bd21c82600a0356298 (20:04): 40f8fba47f4f263981acedf335d3f269: does it matter for the 'clean origin' bit ?
40f8fba47f4f263981acedf335d3f269 (20:05): not i am aware of, i only do canvas 2d, what's the 'clean origin' issue? u have a test case?
3e06fa3927cbdf4e9d93ba4541acce86 (20:25): ok. I never remember that. Thanks

40f8fba47f4f263981acedf335d3f269 (20:35): 3e06fa3927cbdf4e9d93ba4541acce86: the first '2px' sets both top and bottom, and the first '0' sets both left and right, so the second '0' is specifically set to overwrite the first '2px'.
c2eb257d1afa6da62c7dd11790e063f3 (20:36): top/bottom left/right, top left/right bottom, top right bottom left
29727935682f55b4c65eda46e00786f1 (20:43): I work in a newspaper, and I'm trying to convince my boss to switch to HTML web app instead of native ones
29727935682f55b4c65eda46e00786f1 (20:43): Do you maybe have some smart apps I can show to my boss ?

2c801963ac4e96f503bacd185b18a79c (21:07): hm i have a weird issue when repainting a canvas like _layer.canvas.ctx.putImageData(this.snapshot, 0, 0);
2c801963ac4e96f503bacd185b18a79c (21:07): one browser repaints well, while the other doesnt. it doesnt seem to be a cache problem

0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (21:15): woo 88 more tweets and i hit 10k
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (21:16): probably more about cats than i'd prefer
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (21:17): i try to keep it humor and webdev related when i can
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (21:17): for your 10th tweet you should guesstimate how many minutes / seconds / whatevs you spend thinking about your tweets
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (21:18): to show how much time you've wasted when you could've been pursuing more noble goals
2360aabaa09d5610935ee7e2283f0780 (21:18): like getting drunk, eating too much, having sex, or writing open source software
0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (21:19): i may tweet how many days i've been on twitter, and perhaps some stats of how many tweets per day since then to reach the 10k
